info.author: Tetrad Implemented by DataShop@CMU datashop-help@lists.andrew.cmu.edu
info.abstract:
The Estimator component takes as input a tab-delimited data set and a tetrad graph. Based on the input graph, this component will estimate parameters for a model that is selected (SEM or Bayes).
Tetrad Website
info.outputs:
tetrad-graph - SEM estimated graph if SEM is selected in the options. Otherwise, if Bayes is selected, then it is the original graph.
tetrad-im - Instatiated model as output from the estimator.
